segments.text: Can I have your keys , please ? Thank you . Here's your statement .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Excuse me . What are these charges ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , these are the phone charges and these are for something from the bar .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Wait a minute . I made a phone call , but I never made a connection .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I know , sir . Those aren't telephone company charges . Those are hotel charges .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm sorry , sir . It's our policy .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you . Welcome to our hotel again .
segments.speaker: S1
